message: The main things I'm gonna be addressing are the dashboard, search, user profile pages, and inbox.
Hey everyone, I'm about to embark on a major redesign of http://www.setformarriage.com and wanted to see if anyone has any feedback on it.
I'd recommend engaging a professional designer to raise the overall level of the look & feel to make it seem on par with the other matchmaking sites
I will leave the task of looking inside to others - as I'm engaged, I don't want to do anything like signing up for a dating site, haha.
Initial impressions - the home page does a very good job of making it clear what the site is about and how to get started
Haha, well if I have a minute I'll see if I can get an invisible demo user in there or something

i'd suggest you remove the banner ad from below the fold on the landing page.

People understand  that add supported sites need ads but you wont make any money displaying below the fold.

Also if you are interested in attracting guys i'd be happy to do a test banner exchange with you for our sports chat sites www.LiveChatConcepts.com but we only do 468x60 banner exchanges.
